TestGroupDocumentation.Title: createMarshaller, createUnmarshaller and createValidator tests. (content tree test)
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: Compile a simple schema to create a java binding classes. Test the methods createMarshaller, createUnmarshaller and createValidator using this context.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: createMarshaller creates a marshaller object
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates a marshaller object, creates a java content tree and marshals it using the marshaller.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Evgueni Rouban

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: createUnmarshaller creates a unmarshaller object
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates a unmarshaller object and unmarshals JAXBContext.xml.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Evgueni Rouban

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: createBinder creates a binder object
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates a binder object, unmarshals JAXBContext.xml and then modifies result.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Alexey Vishentsev

TestCaseDocumentation.Description: public <T> Binder<T> createBinder(Class<T> domType) Returns always a new valid Binder object.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: createJAXBIntrospector creates a JAXBIntrospector object
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates a JAXBIntrospector object.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Alexey Vishentsev

TestCaseSpec.InlineAssertion: createJAXBIntrospector() creates introspector that is not null.
